data.title: Michael Gray Service Details - Dorchester, Massachusetts
data.meta_description: Mr. Riley began serving the Boston and the Greater Boston communities with professional and dignified services that became synonymous with the Riley name. Today, the Antoine family vows to continue in the tradition that began some 57 years ago.
data.text:
Condolences & Tributes

We encourage you to share any memorable photos or stories about Michael. All tributes placed on and purchased through this memorial website will remain on in perpetuity for future generations.

Provide comfort for the family of Michael James Gray by sending flowers.

Send Flowers

R

To The Gray Family, I know, Michael will be truly missed. May you reflect back over the many wonderful memories you shared together and I am sure they will bring a smile to your heart. The Bible promises we will see our dead love ones come back in the resurrection.(Revelation 21:3,4). Allow Gods word to bring you comfort, peace, and hope

Ramona Ellison - Wednesday October 31, 2018 via Condolence Message
